questions.question_text: What is the name of the Change Enablement life cycle Phase which supports Phase 4. What needs to be done?
Which is not a requirement of a good policy?

discussion.content:
Inputs and outputs—The COBIT 5 inputs and outputs are the process work products/artefacts considered necessary
to support operation of the process. They enable key decisions, provide a record and audit trail of process activities, and
enable follow-up in the event of an incident. They are defined at the key governance/management practice level, may
include some work products used only within the process, and are often essential inputs to other processes.

Selected Answer: B
I think it is B

Work products are artefacts associated with the execution of a process.
https://books.google.com.ar/books?id=AwcVuJou960C&pg=PA47&lpg=PA47&dq=outcome+work+product+artefact+associated+with+the+execution+of+a+process&source=bl&ots=a1AjL09IaA&sig=ACfU3U3vKyb8JH6E9Fd_r7dosRCLlz_zag&hl=es-419&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjluvj9k8XmAhVjUt8KHTpaCBkQ6AEwCXoECAsQAQ#v=onepage&q=outcome%20work%20product%20artefact%20associated%20with%20the%20execution%20of%20a%20process&f=false
Work Product is an artefact associated with the execution of a process. Answer should be B.

questions.question_text: What term refers to an artifact associated with the execution of a process?

discussion.content:
Agree. From the ISACA materials:
– Appropriate amount of information—The extent to which the volume of information is appropriate for the task at hand

questions.question_text: What attributes describes the quantity of information that is suitable for the required activity?
What is the name of an enterprise communication mechanism which provides more guidance on desired organizational behavior?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
refer to page 80. "Rules and norms, which provide more guidance on desired organisational behaviour."

I think the right answer is 
C. Principles and policies
Your thoughts?

comments.content: Principles and policies are a very important communication mechanism for corporate values and the desired behaviour.
